questions.question_text: "orientation" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: A session that provides introductory information
questions.example_sentence: All new volunteers must attend an orientation before beginning their duties.
questions.explanation:
オリエンテーション・導入説明会
メンテナンスマニュアル
評価レビュー
特別入場券

questions.question_text: "assign" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: To give someone a specific job or role
questions.example_sentence: Volunteers will be assigned to different exhibition halls based on their interests.
questions.explanation:
割り当てる・任命する
設備交換
一時閉鎖
物販購入

questions.question_text: "attire" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: Clothing that is suitable for a specific situation
A section of the museum store
questions.example_sentence: Volunteers should wear appropriate attire during museum events.
questions.explanation:
服装・衣装
スタッフ割引
ストアの一角
セキュリティチェック

questions.question_text: "supervise" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: To watch over and guide someone's work
questions.example_sentence: Experienced staff will supervise volunteers throughout the event.
questions.explanation:
監督する・指導する
予算作成
展示デザイン
募金イベントの宣伝

questions.question_text: "availability" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: The state of being free or able to participate
The cost of a membership card
The number of years the museum has operated
questions.example_sentence: Volunteers must submit their availability for weekend shifts.
questions.explanation:
参加できる時間帯・都合
休館日の規定
会員カードの費用
運営年数
